mapper.select: SELECT wt.id, wt.user_no as userNo, au.user_name as userName, DATE_FORMAT(wt.build_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as buildTime, wt.title, wt.content, wt.feedback_content as feedbackContent, wt.state, wt.receiver_user_no as receiverUserNo, DATE_FORMAT(wt.receiver_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as receiverTime, DATE_FORMAT(wt.feedback_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as feedbackTime, wt.feedback_user_no as feedbackUserNo, wt.task_type as taskType, wt.position_code as positionCode, DATE_FORMAT(wt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime , DATE_FORMAT(wt.edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as editTime FROM wlsms_task wt left join admin_user au on wt.user_no = au.user_no where wt.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wlsms_task (user_no, build_time, title, content, state, task_type, position_code, create_time, edit_time) values (#{userNo}, now(), #{title}, #{content}, 1, #{taskType}, #{positionCode}, now(), now());
mapper.update:
update wlsms_task
build_time = now(), edit_time = now(),
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
id = #{id} and state = 1
mapper.delete: delete from wlsms_task where id = #{id} and state = 1
